docs.title: 🏡 Welcome to K&M House Docs
docs.text: Welcome! This site is a living reference for everything about the house—floor plans, dimensions, paint colors, finishes, utilities, and maintenance details. It’s designed to keep all important information in one easy-to-browse place.

docs.title: 📖 What You’ll Find Here
docs.text:
• Floor Plans → Visual layouts for each floor
  • Utilities → Electrical, plumbing, HVAC, etc
  • Room Details → Paint colors, finishes, and fixtures

docs.title: 🗂 How It’s Organized
docs.text:
• Rooms Organized by floor, each room page includes its size, finishes, and key details.

  • House Items General details like floor plans, utilities, and maintenance schedules live here.

docs.title: 🔍 Quick Links
docs.text:
• 📐 Floor Plans
  • 🎨 First Room
  • ⚡ Utilities

💡 Tip: Use the search bar at the top to quickly find any room, color, or fixture.

docs.title: Basement
docs.text:
• Unfinished
  • Cement floor
  • Does not extend to addition (see floor plan)
  • Renovation is on posts, approved by engineer
